node.name: Refal Plus Development Tools (RfpDT)
node.shortdescription:
Refal Plus Development Tools (RfpDT) is an IDE for developing programs written in Refal Plus, a functional programming language:

http://pat.keldysh.ru/~roman/org.refal.rfpdt.help.manual/

RfpDT provide:

* Syntax coloring
* Highlighting of matching brackets
* Automatic formatting
* Visualizing errors
* Running Refal programs
* Debugging
node.body:
Refal Plus Development Tools (RfpDT) is an IDE for developing programs written in Refal Plus, a functional programming language:

http://pat.keldysh.ru/~roman/org.refal.rfpdt.help.manual/

RfpDT provide:

* Syntax coloring
* Highlighting of matching brackets
* Automatic formatting
* Visualizing errors
* Running Refal programs
* Debugging
node.companyname: The Program Systems Institute of RAS
